00025     void PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries(G4Event* event) {
00026         generator_->GeneratePrimaryVertex(event);
00027 
00028         // automatically setting genStatus to 1 for particle gun primaries
00029         if (dynamic_cast<G4ParticleGun*>(generator_) != NULL) {
00030 
00031             int nPV = event->GetNumberOfPrimaryVertex();
00032             for (int iPV = 0; iPV < nPV; ++iPV) {
00033                 G4PrimaryVertex* curPV = event->GetPrimaryVertex(iPV);
00034                 int nPar = curPV->GetNumberOfParticle();
00035                 for (int iPar = 0; iPar < nPar; ++iPar) {
00036                     UserPrimaryParticleInformation* primaryInfo = new UserPrimaryParticleInformation();
00037                     primaryInfo->setHepEvtStatus(1);
00038                     curPV->GetPrimary(iPar)->SetUserInformation(primaryInfo);
00039                 }
00040             }
00041 
00042         }
00043 
00044         // Activate the plugin manager hook.        
00045         pluginManager_->generatePrimary(event);
00046     }
